import React, { Component } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { DataContext } from "./Context" import "./Header.css" import logo from "./logo.png" class Header extends Component { static contextType = DataContext constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { // selectedCurrency: "0", value: "0" } } onChangeHandler = (event) => { this.setState({ value: event.target.value }) this.updateCurrency(event.target.value) } render() { const { categories, updateCategory, updateCurrency, currentCurrency } = this.context console.log(this.state.value) console.log(this.context.currentCurrency) return (
{categories.map(({ name }) => (
  • updateCategory(name)} className="header__links" > {name}
))}
Cart
) } } export default Header
